Vampirtron:
     He could only let himself be carried, as his strength had fled him. "Ohh, Cruse the Pit, the Hunger! I need to feed again!" In his mind he was fighting a war with his hunger, and it was winning...
 catmastero wrote:"Of course" he said and helped Nightlight carry Vampirtron to the
Medical Bay.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "okie"said the femme while she trasformed to her robot mode after 
> that she looked to Kenzo"Kenzo can you give me a hand, please?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
> > 
> > Rodimus pulled up at the Maximal base, and transformed to robot 
> mode.
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Lighten up Nightlight. You'll enjoy life a little 
> more.
> > 
> > Rodimus' lighter "Hot Rod" side was showing right now as it 
> sometimes does. Rodimus wasn't sure why though.
> > 
> > Rodimus grabs the artifact from Kup, and Kup transforms to bot mode 
> also. They both start to carry it to the lab.
> > 
> > Kup: Nightlight, get Vampirtron to the medbay and see what you can 
> do for him.
